law.catch_line: Compensation Of Legal Counsel And Commissioners
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] The compensation of legal counsel and commissioners appointed by the governor shall, unless otherwise provided, be determined by the governor and council, who shall approve such claims before they are sent to the comptroller. Chapter 6: Compensation of legal counsel and commissioners [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 15 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The compensation of legal counsel and commissioners appointed by the governor shall, unless otherwise provided, be determined by the governor.
